tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE labeled_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    features JSONB,
    label VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE training_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    feature_vector JSONB,
    label VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES labeled_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE model (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE model_training_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    training_data_id INT,
    accuracy FLOAT,
    loss FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES model(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (training_data_id) REFERENCES training_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_sources_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    source_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES labeled_data(data_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES data_sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE labeled_data_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    label_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES labeled_data(data_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (label_id) REFERENCES data_labels(label_id)
);
